title: RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12004 Gas Sensor Module Overview
content: The RAK12004 is a gas sensor module, part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Sensor series. The sensor used is the MQ-2 from Zhengzhou Winsen Electronics.
parent_content: The RAK12004 is a gas sensor module, part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Sensor series. The sensor used is the MQ-2 from Zhengzhou Winsen Electronics.

title: RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Mounting
content:
The RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module can be mounted to the IO slot of the [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock/quickstart/#wisblock-base) board. **Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12005 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Mounting
parent_content:
The RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module can be mounted to the IO slot of the [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock/quickstart/#wisblock-base) board. **Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12005 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Mounting

title: RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Chipset > Vendor and Part Number Information [TABLE]

RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Pinout [TABLE]
content:
The RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module comprises a standard 40-pin WisConnector. The WisConnector allows the RAK12004 module to mounted to a WisBlock Base Board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 2**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
**I2C** related pin, **ALERT**, **EN**, **VBAT**, **3V3**, and **GND** are connected to 40-pin WisConnector.  
> **Image:** RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Pinout
parent_content:
The RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module comprises a standard 40-pin WisConnector. The WisConnector allows the RAK12004 module to mounted to a WisBlock Base Board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 2**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
**I2C** related pin, **ALERT**, **EN**, **VBAT**, **3V3**, and **GND** are connected to 40-pin WisConnector.  
> **Image:** RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Pinout

title: RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Mechanical Characteristics > WisConnector PCB Layout > WisConnector PCB Footprint and Recommendations [IMAGE]

RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Schematic Diagram > Power Supply Circuit > RAK12004 Step-Up Power Supply Circuit [TABLE]
content:
Figure 5 shows RAK12004 step-up power supply circuit.  
* **VBAT** Battery voltage (max voltage is 4.2V)
* **EN** Power enable pin (active high). This pin is connected to **IO6** of WisBlock Core.  
> **Image:** RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Power Supply
parent_content:
Figure 5 shows RAK12004 step-up power supply circuit.  
* **VBAT** Battery voltage (max voltage is 4.2V)
* **EN** Power enable pin (active high). This pin is connected to **IO6** of WisBlock Core.  
> **Image:** RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Power Supply

title: RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Schematic Diagram > Gas Detector Circuit > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Detector Circuit [TABLE]
content:
Figure 6 shows the gas detector circuit.  
* **U2** Gas sensor  
The heater voltage requires a 5V supply which is provided by the 5V step-up converter. This is needed to achieve the standard working temperature of the sensor. The pins 1 and 3 voltage (5V) supply the detect voltage to load resistance R12. The **AOUT** pin is the voltage of load resistance R12 which represents the reading of the U2 sensor.
parent_content:
Figure 6 shows the gas detector circuit.  
* **U2** Gas sensor  
The heater voltage requires a 5V supply which is provided by the 5V step-up converter. This is needed to achieve the standard working temperature of the sensor. The pins 1 and 3 voltage (5V) supply the detect voltage to load resistance R12. The **AOUT** pin is the voltage of load resistance R12 which represents the reading of the U2 sensor.  
* **U3** ADC121C021 12-Bit Analog-to-Digital converter with alert function. The U3 power supply is 5V.  
> **Image:** RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Detector Circuit

title: RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Schematic Diagram > Gas Detector Circuit > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Detector Circuit [TABLE]
content:
* **U3** ADC121C021 12-Bit Analog-to-Digital converter with alert function. The U3 power supply is 5V.  
> **Image:** RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Detector Circuit
parent_content:
Figure 6 shows the gas detector circuit.  
* **U2** Gas sensor  
The heater voltage requires a 5V supply which is provided by the 5V step-up converter. This is needed to achieve the standard working temperature of the sensor. The pins 1 and 3 voltage (5V) supply the detect voltage to load resistance R12. The **AOUT** pin is the voltage of load resistance R12 which represents the reading of the U2 sensor.  
* **U3** ADC121C021 12-Bit Analog-to-Digital converter with alert function. The U3 power supply is 5V.  
> **Image:** RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Detector Circuit

title: RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Schematic Diagram > Voltage Level Shifter Circuit > Voltage Level Shifter Circuit in RAK12004
content:
The 40-pin WisConnector voltage has a voltage level of 3.3V while U2 and U3 have 5V. To interface the different voltage level between 40-pin Wisconnector and gas sensor, the RAK12004 has a built-in voltage level shifter circuit.  
> **Image:** Voltage Level Shifter Circuit
parent_content:
The 40-pin WisConnector voltage has a voltage level of 3.3V while U2 and U3 have 5V. To interface the different voltage level between 40-pin Wisconnector and gas sensor, the RAK12004 has a built-in voltage level shifter circuit.  
> **Image:** Voltage Level Shifter Circuit

title: RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Schematic Diagram > I2C Address > RAK12004 I2C Address Configuration
content:
The I2C address of the Analog-to-Digital converter chip of RAK12004 can be configured via resistor jumpers as shown in Figure 8.  
> **Image:** RAK12004 I2C Address
parent_content:

title: RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Schematic Diagram > J2 Connector Pinout > RAK12004 J2 Connector Pinout [IMAGE]
content:
RAK12004 has an additional connector to provide an extra interface to the module. The pinout of J2 connector is shown in Figure 9.  
> **Image:** J2 Connector Pinout

title: RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12004 WisBlock MQ2 Gas Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Schematic Diagram > WisConnector > RAK12004 MQ2 Gas Sensor Module 40-pin WisConnector Pinout [TABLE]
content:
Figure 10 shows 40-pin WisConnector pinout.  
* **VBAT** battery voltage
* **I2C1_SDA** and **I2C1_SCL** are I2C related pins
* **EN** is power chip enable pin
* **ALERT** is analog-to-digital converter alert pin  
> **Image:** RAK12004 MQ2 Gas Sensor Module 40-pin WisConnector
parent_content:
Figure 10 shows 40-pin WisConnector pinout.

* **I2C1_SDA** and **I2C1_SCL** are I2C related pins
* **EN** is power chip enable pin
* **ALERT** is analog-to-digital converter alert pin  
> **Image:** RAK12004 MQ2 Gas Sensor Module 40-pin WisConnector
